sentences.english: Now the number has reached closely to 250, half of which have direct investment in sino-foreign joint ventures.
sentences.chinese: 其中有半數直接投資於中外合資企業。

sentences.english: In Chapter four, predict the positive effects of purchasing-house-for-pension by joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，預測了推行合資購房養老的積極效應。

sentences.english: Shanghai BOWOO Automation System Equipment Co. , Ltd. Sino-foreign joint ventures. Located in the Qingpu District, Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海寶偶自動化系統設備有限公司中外合資企業。

sentences.english: China's co-financed railway is progressing at a quite slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 所以，中國合資鐵路發展緩慢。

sentences.chinese: 一家合資企業會計北京電焊工求職經理的助理。

sentences.english: The multi-language software system can be used widely in jointed ventures in China.
sentences.chinese: 多語種的應用軟件在中外合資企業應用前景光明。

sentences.english: I think a joint venture would be beneficial to both of us 。
sentences.chinese: 我認爲合資經營對雙方都是有利的。

sentences.english: EKC participates in and actively manages several Sino-foreign equity joint venture enterprises in China.
sentences.chinese: 我們參與並積極管理幾家中外合資企業。

sentences.english: DFL is Nissan's joint venture in China with Dongfeng Motor Group Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 龍是日產的合資企業，在中國東風汽車集團有限公司。

sentences.english: We have new methods likepensation trade and joint ventrue.
sentences.chinese: 我們有賠償貿易以及合資謀劃。

sentences.english: Dezhou factory, JV financial management and financial analysis.
sentences.chinese: 德州工廠，合資公司財務管理及財務分析。

sentences.english: Assistant to the manager of the accounting department of a joint venture enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 一家合資企業會計部門經理助理。

sentences.english: This JV is the largest gas meter factory owned by Actaris in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 本合資廠是愛拓利公司在亞洲最大的燃氣表生產廠。

sentences.english: A joint venture with a European company would be the best way to enter the European market.
sentences.chinese: 與歐洲公司合資經營是進入歐洲市場的最佳途徑。

sentences.english: A:The other party withdrew all their investment from the joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 對方從合資公司中抽走了投資。

sentences.english: Tan sits as chairman of both Fortune Tobacco and the new venture.
sentences.chinese: 陳永栽爲福川菸草和新合資公司的主席。

definition: to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
